item_prototype.name: drbd-{#DRBDRESID}-{#DRBDRESNAME}-al
item_prototype.description:
al (activity log). Number of updates of the activity log area of the meta data.
http://www.drbd.org/users-guide/ch-admin.html#s-performance-indicators

item_prototype.name: drbd-{#DRBDRESID}-{#DRBDRESNAME}-ap
item_prototype.description:
ap (application pending). Number of block I/O requests forwarded to DRBD, but not yet answered by DRBD
http://www.drbd.org/users-guide/ch-admin.html#s-performance-indicators

item_prototype.name: drbd-{#DRBDRESID}-{#DRBDRESNAME}-bm
item_prototype.description:
bm (bit map). Number of updates of the bitmap area of the meta data.
http://www.drbd.org/users-guide/ch-admin.html#s-performance-indicators

item_prototype.name: drbd-{#DRBDRESID}-{#DRBDRESNAME}-cs
item_prototype.description:
A resource’s connection state
http://www.drbd.org/users-guide/ch-admin.html#s-connection-states

item_prototype.name: drbd-{#DRBDRESID}-{#DRBDRESNAME}-dr
item_prototype.description:
dr (disk read). Net data read from local hard disk; in Kibyte.
http://www.drbd.org/users-guide/ch-admin.html#s-performance-indicators

item_prototype.name: drbd-{#DRBDRESID}-{#DRBDRESNAME}-ds_local
item_prototype.description:
A resource’s disk state
http://www.drbd.org/users-guide/ch-admin.html#s-disk-states

item_prototype.name: drbd-{#DRBDRESID}-{#DRBDRESNAME}-ds_remote
item_prototype.description:
A resource’s disk state
http://www.drbd.org/users-guide/ch-admin.html#s-disk-states

item_prototype.name: drbd-{#DRBDRESID}-{#DRBDRESNAME}-dw
item_prototype.description:
dw (disk write). Net data written on local hard disk; in Kibyte.
http://www.drbd.org/users-guide/ch-admin.html#s-performance-indicators

item_prototype.name: drbd-{#DRBDRESID}-{#DRBDRESNAME}-ep
item_prototype.description:
ep (epochs). Number of epoch objects. Usually 1. Might increase under I/O load when using either the barrier or the none write ordering method.
http://www.drbd.org/users-guide/ch-admin.html#s-performance-indicators

item_prototype.name: drbd-{#DRBDRESID}-{#DRBDRESNAME}-flags
item_prototype.description:
I/O state flags.
http://www.drbd.org/users-guide/ch-admin.html#s-io-flags

item_prototype.name: drbd-{#DRBDRESID}-{#DRBDRESNAME}-id
item_prototype.description: Resource ID.

item_prototype.name: drbd-{#DRBDRESID}-{#DRBDRESNAME}-lo
item_prototype.description:
lo (local count). Number of open requests to the local I/O sub-system issued by DRBD.
http://www.drbd.org/users-guide/ch-admin.html#s-performance-indicators

item_prototype.name: drbd-{#DRBDRESID}-{#DRBDRESNAME}-name
item_prototype.description: A resource's name.

item_prototype.name: drbd-{#DRBDRESID}-{#DRBDRESNAME}-nr
item_prototype.description:
nr (network receive). Volume of net data received by the partner via the network connection; in Kibyte.
http://www.drbd.org/users-guide/ch-admin.html#s-performance-indicators

item_prototype.name: drbd-{#DRBDRESID}-{#DRBDRESNAME}-ns
item_prototype.description:
ns (network send). Volume of net data sent to the partner via the network connection; in Kibyte.
http://www.drbd.org/users-guide/ch-admin.html#s-performance-indicators

item_prototype.name: drbd-{#DRBDRESID}-{#DRBDRESNAME}-oos
item_prototype.description:
oos (out of sync). Amount of storage currently out of sync; in Kibibyte
http://www.drbd.org/users-guide/ch-admin.html#s-performance-indicators

item_prototype.name: drbd-{#DRBDRESID}-{#DRBDRESNAME}-pe
item_prototype.description:
pe (pending). Number of requests sent to the partner, but that have not yet been answered by the latter.
http://www.drbd.org/users-guide/ch-admin.html#s-performance-indicators

item_prototype.name: drbd-{#DRBDRESID}-{#DRBDRESNAME}-protocol
item_prototype.description: Replication protocol. Replication protocol used by the resource. Either A, B or C. http://www.drbd.org/users-guide/s-replication-protocols.html

item_prototype.name: drbd-{#DRBDRESID}-{#DRBDRESNAME}-ro_local
item_prototype.description:
A resource’s role. (Primary/Secondary/Unknown)
http://www.drbd.org/users-guide/ch-admin.html#s-roles

item_prototype.name: drbd-{#DRBDRESID}-{#DRBDRESNAME}-ro_remote
item_prototype.description:
A resource’s role. (Primary/Secondary/Unknown)
http://www.drbd.org/users-guide/ch-admin.html#s-roles

item_prototype.name: drbd-{#DRBDRESID}-{#DRBDRESNAME}-ua
item_prototype.description:
ua (unacknowledged). Number of requests received by the partner via the network connection, but that have not yet been answered.
http://www.drbd.org/users-guide/ch-admin.html#s-performance-indicators

item_prototype.name: drbd-{#DRBDRESID}-{#DRBDRESNAME}-version
item_prototype.description: DRBD version

item_prototype.name: drbd-{#DRBDRESID}-{#DRBDRESNAME}-wo
item_prototype.description:
wo (write order). Currently used write ordering method: b(barrier), f(flush), d(drain) or n(none).
http://www.drbd.org/users-guide/ch-admin.html#s-performance-indicators

trigger_prototype.name: DRBD-Connection State for {#DRBDRESID}:{#DRBDRESNAME} is not Connected
DRBD-Local Disk State for {#DRBDRESID}:{#DRBDRESNAME} is not UpToDate
